document.full_text: phil jackson, the most successful coach in nba history, walked gingerly off the court for what is likely to be the final time following the los angeles lakers' season-ending loss to the dallas mavericks on sunday.
document.title: lakers coach jackson bids farewell after playoff exit
lines_and_colors: phil jackson, the most successful coach in nba history, walked gingerly off the court for what is likely to be the final time following the los angeles lakers' season-ending loss to the dallas mavericks on sunday.
